text.p: True or False: If the columns of an [mathjaxinline]n\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] span [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]A^ tA[/mathjaxinline] must be invertible.

font.p: Since [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is square, if its columns span [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], it must be invertible by the Invertible Matrix Theorem. Therefore [mathjaxinline]A^ t[/mathjaxinline] is invertible. The product of two invertible matrices is invertible, so [mathjaxinline]A^ tA[/mathjaxinline] is invertible.
